<title level="1" right="Trait">[Range](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 17</row>

These attacks will either list a finite range or a range increment, which follows the normal rules for range increments.
name: Range
